MetaData.MetaDataItem: 1. Follow the instructions for your Z-wave certified controller to exclude a device to the Z-wave network. 2.Once the controller is ready to exclude your device, press the red button 3 times to exclude it from the Z-wave network.

Automatic Water shut off controller, fits over standard 1/2”, 3/4” and 1” ball valves, no plumbing required, 12V DC power, Blue LED status indicator, 500 Series Z-Wave. Includes mounting kit and and AC Adapter and quick start guide, Z-Wave and FCC certified. Prevents water damage when combined with standard smart home automation solutions.

Press and hold the button 10 seconds and release the button. The device will send the reset notification to the list node in the group1 and erases the device memory , when the light flash it is resetting success. Note: This should only be used in the event your networks primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.

1. Follow the instructions for your Z-wave certified controller to include a device to the Z-wave network. 2.Once the controller is ready to include your device, press the red button 3 times to include it in the Z-wave network.
